response: narrative=MP was last seen leaving a casino linked to an organized protest. After a sudden religious conversion, he was spotted on a hiking trail near Craigour Road.

narrative=Garry Charlton, newly moved to the area, vanished from his residence at 10 Garden Wood, Inchmarlo. His mother reported him missing when he failed to attend an arranged meeting. Garry was last seen conversing with a friend on Dee Street, Banchory. He was later found safe by his grandfather.

narrative=Garry Charlton was last seen leaving a casino located on Beltie Road, AB31 4JT, with his friend, Dorothy. Recently discharged from a care facility, Garry had been struggling to readjust and was reportedly feeling overwhelmed. His behavior at the casino was described as erratic, and after losing contact with Dorothy, he vanished into the night. Later, traces of his movements were found near a snow area along Golden Knowes Road, Aberdeenshire, AB45 2JE, suggesting he may have wandered in a disoriented state. After several days, Garry was safely traced by his family on Craigour Road, Torphins, AB31 4UE, having found temporary shelter with a local resident.

narrative=Garry Charlton was last seen leaving his office, located close to the homeowners association. Colleague Charles Smith noted Garry seemed distracted lately, concerned about obligations at home and issues discussed during parent-teacher meetings. He often visited the snow area near Bridgend of Glenlivet, Ballindalloch, AB37 9BX, to clear his mind. After he was reported missing, extensive searches focused there. Garry was eventually traced by police on Rannes Street, Insch, AB52 6JJ, safe but disoriented.
narrative=Garry Charlton, after facing romantic rejection, vanished from 10 Garden Wood, Inchmarlo. Last seen on a hiking trail near a snow area with colleague Charles Smith.

narrative=Garry Charlton was last seen at a casino near March Road, Buckie, shortly after his mother expressed concerns over his recently outed LGBTQ+ identity. Friends reported he might have headed towards the snow area near Bridgend of Glenlivet for some solitude.
narrative=Garry Charlton was last seen at a hiking trail near his Home on Rannes Street, Insch. After a romantic rejection and sudden religious conversion, he went missing.
